Package com.shopify.buy.dataprovider

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AddressService
    Service that provides Address API endpoints.
    BuyClient  
    Callback<T>
    Callback for asynchronous API operations
    CancellableTask
    A task that can be cancelled
    CheckoutService
    Service that provides Checkout API endpoints.

    Represents request interceptor for Product API calls CustomerService

    Service that provides Customer API endpoints.
    OrderService
    Service that provides Order API endpoints.

    Represents request interceptor for Product API calls ProductService

    Service that provides Product API endpoints.
    StoreApiInterceptor
    Represents request interceptor for Store API calls StoreService
